get.description: Retrieve the available space on the user's cloud. Note that this data is not real-time computed: it can take a couple of minutes after a deletion or an upload to get the actual remaining free space.

scopes.cloud: specific scope to be granted for read and write access to user's Cloud, limited to the application's folder
scopes.cloudfullread: specific scope to be granted for read access to the whole user's Cloud
scopes.cloudfullwrite: specific scope to be granted for write access to the whole user's Cloud
